title: 47 in. Wood Handle Closed Back Round Point Shovel
description: This closed back round point shovel has the perfect design for working in all areas. It features a closed back with a steel plate welded over the pocket on the underside of the blade that adds strength, keeps dirt from piling up, and protects wood handles from dampness and rot. This shovel is ideal for contractor as well as professional use on the jobsite. The 47 in. hardwood handle is durable and was built to last.
